name: subgum
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dish popular in North America that is based on a Chinese dish consisting of meat or fish mixed with different vegetables and noodles or rice: You can make the subgum with beef instead of chicken. Sub gum generally contains bamboo shoots, water chestnuts, and fresh mushrooms. Subgum fried rice is quick and easy to prepare.
More examplesFewer examplesThey suggested we tried the subgum wonton - fried crispy wontons and a combination of mushrooms, fresh shrimp, chicken, bamboo shoots, and water chestnuts.
